# NEHotspotHelperResult.authenticationRequired

**Case**

The network requires authentication again. This result is only valid in response to a command with type [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperCommandType/maintain].

## Declaration

```swift
case authenticationRequired
```

## Results

- **NEHotspotHelperResult.success**: The command was handled successfully.
- **NEHotspotHelperResult.failure**: The command failed to be handled.
- **NEHotspotHelperResult.uiRequired**: The operation requires user interaction. This result is only valid in response to a command with type [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperCommandType/authenticate].
- **NEHotspotHelperResult.commandNotRecognized**: The helper did not recognize the command type.
- **NEHotspotHelperResult.unsupportedNetwork**: After attempting to authenticate, the Hotspot Helper app determined that it can’t perform the authentication. This result is only valid in response to commands of type [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperCommandType/authenticate] and [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperCommandType/presentUI].
- **NEHotspotHelperResult.temporaryFailure**: The Hotspot Helper app determined that it is temporarily unable to perform the authentication. This result is only valid in response to commands of type [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperCommandType/authenticate] and [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEHotspotHelperCommandType/presentUI].
